description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Flame, Spray

Note: Space Marines Only. Relic Master-Crafted Astartes Flamer of the Deathwatch. Gauntlet Mounted, has three modes of fire. Concentrated: -20 to Agility Tests to avoid being set on fire or to put out the fire from this weapon. Wide: Increase cone of fire to 60 degrees, +1d5 damage to Hordes. Burst: Replace Spray with Blast (2). Those set on fire by Astartes flamer weapons take +4 damage from the flames.
